Package org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group

Contains group trainers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GroupTrainerInput<K>
    Interface for GroupTrainer inputs.
    Metaoptimizer<LC,X,Y,I,D,O>
    Class encapsulating data transformations in group training in MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer, which is adapter of GroupTrainer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseLocalProcessorJob<K,V,T,R extends Serializable>
    Base job for group training.
    ConstModel<T>
    Model which outputs given constant.
    GroupTrainerBaseProcessorTask<K,V,C,T,R extends Serializable>
    Base task for group trainer.
    GroupTrainerCacheKey<K>
    Class used as a key for caches on which GroupTrainer works.
    GroupTrainerEntriesProcessorTask<K,V,C,R extends Serializable>
    Task for processing entries of cache used for training.
    GroupTrainerKeysProcessorTask<K,C,R extends Serializable>
    Task for processing entries of cache used for training.
    GroupTrainingContext<K,V,L extends HasTrainingUUID>
    Context for group training.
    LocalEntriesProcessorJob<K,V,C,R extends Serializable>
    BaseLocalProcessorJob specified to entry processing.
    LocalKeysProcessorJob<K,V,C,R extends Serializable>
    BaseLocalProcessorJob specified to keys processing.
    MetaoptimizerGroupTrainer<LC extends HasTrainingUUID,K,V,IN extends Serializable,R extends Serializable,I extends Serializable,M extends Model,T extends GroupTrainerInput<K>,G,O extends Serializable,X,Y>
    Group trainer using Metaoptimizer.
    ResultAndUpdates<R>
    Class containing result of computation and updates which should be made for caches.
    UpdatesStrategy<M,U>
    Class encapsulating update strategies for group trainers based on updates.
    UpdateStrategies
    Holder class for various update strategies.

Package org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.group Description

Contains group trainers.
